caption: Relating to the establishment of the Texas Committee on Foreign Investment to review certain transactions involving certain foreign entities; creating a civil penalty.
summary: This bill establishes the Texas Committee on Foreign Investment to review foreign transactions involving critical infrastructure, agricultural land, sensitive personal data, or strategic assets in Texas. While not explicitly targeting Chinese entities, it affects all foreign entities including Chinese businesses and individuals who are not U.S. citizens or permanent residents. Transactions require notification 90 days before closing and may need mitigation agreements. Violations can result in $50,000 penalties per incident.
translation: 该法案设立德克萨斯州外国投资委员会，负责审查涉及关键基础设施、农业用地、敏感个人数据或战略资产的外国交易。虽然没有明确针对中国实体，但该法案影响所有外国实体，包括非美国公民或永久居民的中国企业和个人。交易需要在完成前90天通知，可能需要签订缓解协议。违规每次可能被处以50,000美元罚款。
